Thank you another timeagain for this first prize of two weeks at Camp California in the U.S.A. I'm very happy.

Shopping is not always enjoyable. Last weekend I went to Barcelona with some friends to shop. When we arrived toat the shopping centercentre, I saw a lot of people. I don't understand why theythere waswere a lot of people. My friends and I, I went to a fashionclothes shop - "Mango" - to buy some clothes. Nobody atin the shop came with us to help. There arewere four gaysguys, in this shop. We asked them if someoneone of them could help us. Finally, a girl very friendlyvery friendly girl came with us. We bought some trousers, tee-shirts, and one pair of shoes. My friends bought some things like a red trousers and white tee-shirts. After this, we returned to Andorra. But not always it'sit's not always the same historystory because I like shopping and I think I'm enjoyenjoyable. Not all the time the people are not friendly in the shopsThe people in the shops are not unfriendly all the time.
